comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: "Second lieutenant" isn't a navy rank. This fellow appears to be a "Master," or what would be called a Lieutenant j.g. now. See: civilwarwiki.net/wiki/Union_Insignia_of_the_Civil_War

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
rjones0856:

Thanks for your observation on the rank. We will look further into it and correct as needed!
